definition: to annihilate/abbr. for 殲擊機|歼击机, fighter plane
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: You could ambush them as they run out of the building.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在他们跑出建筑之后将他们歼灭。

sentences.english: She took on the mission of exterminating the apostles.
sentences.chinese: 她承接了歼灭使徒的使命。

sentences.english: About 40 Iraqi divisions were annihilated and the Allied Troops had a light casualty.
sentences.chinese: 伊军约40个师被歼灭，而多国部队伤亡很少。

sentences.english: That formidable remnant had been annihilated; the Guard was dead.
sentences.chinese: 那点锐不可当的残余也被歼灭了，羽林军覆没了。

sentences.english: Our army made use of the good cooperation between small forces and completely eliminated the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 这场战役我军采取掎角之势，一举歼灭敌人。

sentences.english: Superior forces must be concentrated to destroy the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 必须集中优势兵力歼灭敌人。

sentences.english: They knocked out a large number of enemy effectives .
sentences.chinese: 他们歼灭了敌军大批有生力量。

sentences.english: The factories churned out thousands of battle droids to destroy the survivors of the crash.
sentences.chinese: 数千战斗机器人从工厂里涌出来歼灭幸存者。

sentences.english: The soldiers descended upon the enemy camp and destroy it.
sentences.chinese: 战士突然袭击并歼灭了敌营。

sentences.english: Our gun crew was then ordered to destroy this enemy battery.
sentences.chinese: 我们炮兵其后受命歼灭敌人的炮兵连。

sentences.english: A battalion of Nassau, seven hundred strong, was overwhelmed there.
sentences.chinese: 纳索的一营兵，七百人，在那里遭到了歼灭。

sentences.english: Our army has annihilated more than 300 of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中我军共歼灭敌寇三百余人。

sentences.english: Soviet ground forces were quickly enveloped, cut off and destroyed in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 苏联地面部队迅速被包围，被切断并被大量歼灭。

sentences.english: Will Mother Nature or Mankind be the destroyer of planet Earth?
sentences.chinese: 年夜自然照样人类，会将成为地球的歼灭者呢？

sentences.english: We had already wiped out all the enemy troops long before day-break.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓前很久，我们就已经将敌军全部歼灭了。

sentences.english: It is a battle of annihilation, therefore we should do our utmost.
sentences.chinese: 打的是歼灭战，大家一定要全力以赴。

definition: to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to annihilate/to round up and wipe out
to seize control of (an enemy position)/(fig.) to take by storm/to gain (awards, control of a market etc)
to pursue and kill/to wipe out
